case_circumstances: Decomposed remains were found in remote desert.  Pinal county deputies were flagged down by a female in distress and advised of the location of the deceased.  Fingerprints match to 2010 USBP apprehension record under the name Ernesto Perez Hernandez, DOB 22 November 1970, and Mexican citizenship.  None of this self-reported information has been verified.  AAA
